GetDeviceDescriptorSets
GetDeviceDescriptorSets

Contains the logic for the Inertial "Get Device Descriptor Sets" command

Constants
Packet Bytes

The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE  = 0x82

The Data Field Descriptor byte
